name: Laser (betamaj)
description:
Dodge various lasers and try to set your best time! Now on itch.io. Originally a Scratch Game! https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/354682562/

New feature for itch.io release: local storage of your highscore!

Tell me if you found a bug or have a suggestion.

CONTROLS

Computer: Up and Down or W and S

Mobile: Tap above or below the player to go up or down

LASERS AND PICK-UPS

Red Laser:    Takes away half a heart or a full heart.

Orange Laser:  Takes away a heart and a half or two hearts.

Blue Laser:

Takes away almost all of your health if you have 5 hearts.

Shield:  Grants invincibility from red and orange lasers for 10 seconds.

Health Pack:  Gives you back a heart.

CREDITS

Gameplay Music and Game Over Sound Effect - ExplodingGuy123

Mobile Controls - GlicthedOracle

Game Over Screen Text Engine - BlueyKatz

Button Noise, Health Pack Collect, Blue Laser, Blue Laser Charge, Shield Deflect, and Hit Sound Effects made used jsfxr

Title Screen music and Shield Run Out Sound Effect made using BeepBox

Packaged as html using Turbowarp Packager

All other sprites, code, and sound effects by me

PLAYTESTERS

ExplodingGuy123

CHANGELOG

Version 1.3.0 - 8/9/21 - settings, screen shake, optimizations

Version 1.2.0 - 4/20/21 - parallax stuff

Version 1.1.0 - 4/19/21 - New mobile controls by @GlicthedOracle

Version 1.0.1 - 4/8/21 - bug fix related to blue lasers

Version 1.0.0 - 4/2/21 - Initial Release

Started - Early 2019? - shouldn't of took so long but procrastination
